document.full_text: early tuesday morning, sometime after 2 a.m., a violent, windy rainstorm, which brought tornado warnings to parts of georgia, toppled one of the famed magnolias at the entranceway to augusta national.
document.title: mickelson mourns a storm casualty on magnolia lane
lines_and_colors: early tuesday morning, sometime after 2 a.m., a violent, windy rainstorm, which brought tornado warnings to parts of georgia, toppled one of the famed magnolias at the entranceway to augusta national.
